title: SEA Continuous Quality Improvement (CQI) Framework
description: The Continuous Quality Improvement (CQI) reflects SEA's commitment to continually provide quality Catholic education through continuous enhancement of its services to meet the ever-changing needs of its constituents. CQI occurs at all levels of the SLU-SEA Outcomes-Based Education (OBE) system. SEA has introduced key modifications to its CQI framework to strengthen effectiveness.

core_elements.name: CQI's Foundational Goal
core_elements.details: To provide Quality Catholic Education to all students.

core_elements.name: Collaborative Implementation Groups
core_elements.details: These entities work in unison to implement CQI activities across all levels.

cqi_in_obe_framework.integration: The OBE framework integrates CQI through communication loops between the CQI block and Constructive Alignment, OBE Committees, and Program Constituencies.
cqi_in_obe_framework.feedback_loop: Lines from Program Constituencies back to the CQI cycles highlight the importance of stakeholders in shaping SEA’s quality assurance and improvement processes.

figure_reference: Refer to the official SEA documentation or presentation slides for the visual diagram of Figure 2 – SEA CQI Framework.
